EndpointAuthenticationsList.description: The list of service endpoints authentication details.

allowedOrigins.description: The origin domains that are permitted to make a request against the service via CORS.

allowedMethods.description: The methods (HTTP request verbs) that the origin domain may use for a CORS request.

allowedHeaders.description: The request headers that the origin domain may specify on the CORS request.

exposedHeaders.description: The response headers to expose to CORS clients.

maxAgeInSeconds.description: The number of seconds that the client/browser should cache a preflight response.

configuration.description: Account configuration. This can only be set at RecommendationsService Account creation.

endpointAuthentications.description: The list of service endpoints authentication details.

reportsConnectionString.description: Connection string to write Accounts reports to.

systemData.description: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of the resource.

identity.description: The identity used for the resource.

connectionString.description: Connection string to raw input data.

features.description: Modeling features controls the set of supported scenarios\models being computed. This can only be set at Modeling creation.

frequency.description: Modeling frequency controls the modeling compute frequency.

size.description: Modeling size controls the maximum supported input data size.

preAllocatedCapacity.description: ServiceEndpoint pre-allocated capacity controls the maximum requests-per-second allowed for that endpoint. Only applicable when Account configuration is Capacity.

pairedLocation.description: The paired location that will be used by this ServiceEndpoint.

url.description: The URL where the ServiceEndpoint API is accessible at.

systemData.description: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of the resource.

nextLink.description: The link used to get the next page of ServiceEndpoint resources list.

scope.description: The scope that the statuses refers to.
